title: 2017 NFL draft first-round order

organizations.name: european pressphoto agency a new england patriots

text:
2017 NFL draft first-round order Here's how things are stacking up for the first selections in April. Post to Facebook 2017 NFL draft first-round order Here's how things are stacking up for the first selections in April.  //usat.ly/2iUCRg7   2017 NFL draft first-round order USA TODAY Sports Published 8:28 p.m. ET Jan. 1, 2017 | Updated 4 minutes ago CLOSE x Share USA TODAY Sports' Lindsay Jones breaks down how the Patriots managed to pull off a comeback for the ages in Super Bowl LI. USA TODAY Sports A general view of the stage and podium before the 2016 NFL Draft at the Auditorium Theatre. (Photo: Jerry Lai, USA TODAY Sports) 
With the 2016 NFL season officially in the books, the first round of the 2017 NFL draft is set. 
Here's a look at the order for the first round: 
1. Cleveland Browns 
5. Tennessee Titans (from Los Angeles Rams) 
6. New York Jets 
12. Cleveland Browns (from Philadelphia Eagles) 
13. Arizona Cardinals 
15. Philadelphia Eagles* (from Minnesota Vikings) 
16. Baltimore Ravens 
* - coin flip will break tie and determine order. Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed.
